Articles.Content: Yay! This is the only part mod I use aside MJ. You've inspired me to build this in stock.

Love the colonization modules... but one thing, I can't get my Kerbals out of the mobile hab module once they enter in. I do have some mods installed, but I was wondering if anyone else had this problem

YEP nvm, got it to work, I think it was just a mission problem or something

Edited April 5, 2015 by KazanNinja

Nice job on the colony modules! I think the lander is really hard to land with one of the modules docked, the center of gravity gets messed up and it flys weirdly...

At least I managed to land it with the help of Hyperedit
Glad to see this finally moved to releases. Good work to entire team behind this!
How do I attach and detach modules from the endurance?
Does this mod work with FAR now?

How do I attach and detach modules from the endurance?

you can't attach modules if you are in orbit, you can in the VAB

detaching is done by right clicking "decouple node" on a docking port behind the module

you can't attach modules if you are in orbit, you can in the VAB

detaching is done by right clicking "decouple node" on a docking port behind the module

thanks m80:cool:

Mabe it was proposed..

But how about damaged version of endurance modules? In order to recreate famous imprefect docking scene from movie.

This is a super awesome mod, I'm so glad to see the work this team has done.

Hope to see more from you guys!
And am I the only one who uses the Lander as an assault craft?

Mini Ranger anyone?

3.75m adapter is also done but needs a bit of texture work.

The Lander should fly fine with a payload in VTOL mode - you need to keep the throttle low when in horizontal flight though or it'll flip out. Not much can be done about that, sadly :/

Mini Ranger anyone?

http://i.imgur.com/PJQUtYl.png

3.75m adapter is also done but needs a bit of texture work.

The Lander should fly fine with a payload in VTOL mode - you need to keep the throttle low when in horizontal flight though or it'll flip out. Not much can be done about that, sadly :/

That looks awesome!

...Not much can be done about that, sadly :/

Increase RW a little bit?
Thing is, the reaction wheels are massively overpowered anyway... And the Lander flies fine with cargo in VTOL mode.

Mini Ranger anyone?

http://i.imgur.com/PJQUtYl.png

3.75m adapter is also done but needs a bit of texture work.

The Lander should fly fine with a payload in VTOL mode - you need to keep the throttle low when in horizontal flight though or it'll flip out. Not much can be done about that, sadly :/

Yes! My dream is coming true!

Benjee,

Well done! Definitely in my top 5 KSP mods of all time. Thanks for all your work.

tSO

Over powered is the RW from the movie (interstellar), when it dock spinning and then with an of centered trust, go forward instead of keept spinning like crazy. (After the explosion on it). That's for sure is over power.

Benjee,

Well done! Definitely in my top 5 KSP mods of all time. Thanks for all your work.

tSO

Wow! Thanks! Welcome to the forums!

Over powered is the RW from the movie (interstellar), when it dock spinning and then with an of centered trust, go forward instead of keept spinning like crazy. (After the explosion on it). That's for sure is over power.

I'll test out some different RW power configs.

Don't bother Benjee10 for me, i was just trying to help.

I don't even playing KSP these days, only working on my parts development.

Cheers!

Mini Ranger anyone?

http://i.imgur.com/PJQUtYl.png

3.75m adapter is also done but needs a bit of texture work.

The Lander should fly fine with a payload in VTOL mode - you need to keep the throttle low when in horizontal flight though or it'll flip out. Not much can be done about that, sadly :/

Does the adapter fit 2 rangers? Can u also make a 5m one?

The 3.75m one fits one Ranger, the 5m will fit 2.

Test fly the Mini-Ranger.

I've decided against VTOL capabilities. Since it's so small and light it doesn't need VTOL, it can just glide to a runway landing. Adding a VTOL engine just adds a huge extra layer of complexity to the parts and getting the balance right etc. etc.

Still needs thrust effects/emissives.

Should the Mini-Ranger be a 1-seater or a 2-seater? I think it's a 2-seater in the movie, with TARS taking up one of the spots. Would you rather have it with 1 seat and a robot or 2 seats? IVA next.
I think is more like the xwing, one pilot and a computer unity to assist flight.
But that would beg the question of how they picked Cooper up when they found him if there aren't other seats... I'm tempted to go with a two seat design.

Should the Mini-Ranger be a 1-seater or a 2-seater? I think it's a 2-seater in the movie, with TARS taking up one of the spots. Would you rather have it with 1 seat and a robot or 2 seats? IVA next.

Like what Climberfx said, it should be a one seater. The second seat is really for TARS, so a second Kerbal would just seem weird to me.
